commentList.content:
設施：很智能
衛生：乾淨
環境：優美
服務：很熱情
commentList.translatedContent:
Facilities: very smart
Hygiene: clean
nice environment

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guests, thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO. CitiGO is designed by internationally renowned designers to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent customer control". The hotel is always committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your next stay!

commentList.content: 飛機晚點選擇了這家三元橋邊上的酒店，入住的時候已經很晚了，一樓大廳是一個多功能的酒吧，還有幾個年輕人在聊天，很喜歡這家店的調性！房間的麪積不大，但是設備齊全，智能化也可以。很多小的設計很走心。餐廳在一樓，早餐品種不多但是夠用。整體都不錯還會選擇的！
commentList.translatedContent: The plane was late and I chose this hotel next to the Sanyuan Bridge. It was very late when I checked in. The lobby on the first floor was a multi-functional bar, and there were several young people chatting. I like the tonality of this store! The size of the room is not large, but it is well-equipped and intelligent. Many small designs are very thoughtful. The restaurant is on the first floor, the breakfast variety is not much but enough. Overall is good and will choose!

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 多次入住了！酒店服務很好，設施也很完備！早餐也很不錯！最為方便的是旁邊就是機場快線三元橋站，往返乘機特別方便，大大節省了時間！下次還會考慮入住。
commentList.translatedContent: Stayed many times! The hotel service is very good, and the facilities are also very complete! The breakfast is also very good! The most convenient one is the Sanyuanqiao Station of the Airport Express Line next to it. It is especially convenient to fly back and forth, which greatly saves time! Will consider staying next time.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 這家酒店更適合小年輕來  一進大廳拐彎就能看見打檯球的地和雙人足球機  訂的豪華大床房 屋內空間不算大 但是很溫馨 東西很全面 外賣 有機器人送上來 不用自己下去拿 很便利  還包括雙人早餐 體驗感很不錯！
commentList.translatedContent: This hotel is more suitable for young people as soon as you enter the lobby and you can see the billiards and the double football machine. The room is not big but the stuff is very warm The convenience also includes the breakfast experience for two people, which is very good!

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……在睡眠和沐浴方面，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！

We will continue to work hard to create more and better staying experiences, and we look forward to your staying again!

feedbackList.content: 抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……CitiGO客房始終嚴守高品質標準。請相信我們的真誠和用心致力於為每位客人創造奢華享受。CitiGO邀請國際知名設計師打造共享客廳，酒吧、餐廳、辦公、閱讀、音樂，除了“睡眠和沐浴”，我們鼓勵客人將其他時間交給酒店公區。我們會在您的建議基礎上，繼續努力提升，真誠期待您的諒解。

CitiGO invites internationally renowned designers to create shared living rooms, bars, restaurants, offices, reading, and music. We will continue to work hard to improve on the basis of your suggestions, and sincerely look forward to your understanding.

commentList.content: 北京參加展會，因為交通方便每次都選三元橋附近的酒店。交通：離地鐵十號線和機場線三元橋站步行5分鐘就到，去老國展步行大概20分鐘。我覺得在帝都很難得。房間設施很好，健身房很棒，在酒店中算是全的。早飯也不錯。
commentList.translatedContent: Beijing participates in the exhibition, because the transportation is convenient, every time I choose the hotel near Sanyuan Bridge. Transportation: A 5-minute walk from Sanyuanqiao Station on Metro Line 10 and Airport Line, and a 20-minute walk from the Old China International Exhibition Center. I think it is very rare in the Imperial City. The room facilities are very good, the gym is great, and it's quite comprehensive in the hotel. Breakfast is also good.

commentList.translatedContent: High cost performance, clean, new facilities, good service

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO服務的認可！我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 三元橋Citigo性價比很高，使我在北京的旅程每晚都住得很舒服。房間都很乾淨，床很舒適。特別喜歡沐浴間的玻璃設計，配上整個房間的氛圍，整個風格就是很時尚。讚！
commentList.translatedContent: Sanyuanqiao Citigo is very cost-effective, making my stay in Beijing very comfortable every night. The rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. I especially like the glass design of the shower room and the atmosphere of the whole room. The whole style is very fashionable. great!

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……在睡眠和沐浴方面，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！

commentList.content: 裝修年輕化，杜拉維特的馬桶挺好看的，早餐還可以。但是設施也有一點要變老舊的感覺了，比如房間的木頭衣掛有磨損痕迹。房間都比較小，適合年輕人短暫住一兩晚
commentList.translatedContent: The decoration is younger, Duravit's toilet is beautiful, and the breakfast is ok. But the facilities also have a feeling of getting old. For example, the wooden clothes hangers in the room have signs of wear and tear. The rooms are relatively small, suitable for young people to stay for a short night or two

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。CitiGO重視每一位客人提出的意見和建議，感謝您的信任和指正。我們一定會不斷反思和改進，為大家創造更好的入住體驗。

commentList.content: 🍃環境：附近有商場比較方便，離地鐵站近，而且酒店還有免費宵夜提供給住戶，總的來說性價比還是可以，推薦情侶或出差人士
commentList.translatedContent: 🍃Environment: It is more convenient to have a shopping mall nearby, it is close to the subway station, and the hotel also provides free supper to the residents. Generally speaking, the price is good. It is recommended for couples or people on business trips.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。在CitiGO，自助早餐7:00-12:00超長待機，再不用在睡懶覺和吃早餐之間煩惱抉擇。每晚22:00-23:00，餐廳提供免費宵夜，溫暖身心。一切衹為讓您享受到更貼心的關懷，真誠期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content:
🚗 交通：酒店的位置絕佳，離地鐵站衹需步行幾分鐘，而且三元橋站無論去哪裡都很方便。

🍃環境：非常喜歡酒店的設計理念和環境，一樓公共區域集飲食娛樂休閑運動清潔於一體，有餐廳吧台、檯球桌、健身房、洗烘衣房等設施，整體環境時尚乾淨、有趣溫馨。房間內部整體結構設計合理，設施一應俱全，兩人住也沒有問題。小冰箱裏每天免費供應礦泉水和飲料，洗漱用品也並非馬馬虎虎，尤其需要誇一誇酒店的床，睡起來非常舒適。

🔔服務：因為需要住5晚，在攜程上備註希望安排一個安靜衛生的房間，酒店提前記下並滿足了需求，安排的房間非常安靜，每日打掃也很乾凈。餐廳的早餐持續供應到中午12點，早餐菜品豐富，中西式都有，所以特意買了含兩人早餐的套餐，下樓吃好吃飽再出門，開啟全新的一天！國慶期間天氣不太好，酒店門口可借傘。低溫出行，吧台的小姐姐每天幫我們接熱水。晚上餓了有免費的小餛飩，點外賣可以在餐廳就餐，也可以由機器人送上樓。

總之以後有需要會再次考慮這家酒店，希望可以保持～
commentList.translatedContent:
🚗 Transportation: The location of the hotel is excellent, just a few minutes walk from the subway station, and Sanyuanqiao Station is very convenient wherever you go.

🍃Environment: I like the design concept and environment of the hotel very much. The public area on the first floor integrates dining, entertainment, leisure and sports. There are restaurants, bar, pool table, gym, washing and drying room and other facilities. The overall environment is stylish, clean, interesting and warm. The overall internal structure of the room is designed reasonably and the facilities are all available, so there is no problem for two people. The small refrigerator provides free mineral water and beverages every day, and the toiletries are not so-so, especially the hotel bed, which is very comfortable to sleep.

🔔Service: Because I need to stay for 5 nights, I noted on Ctrip that I hope to arrange a quiet and sanitary room. The hotel noted and met the needs in advance. The arranged room is very quiet and cleaned daily. The restaurant's breakfast will continue to be served until 12 noon. The breakfast dishes are rich in Chinese and Western styles, so I specially bought a set meal with breakfast for two people. Go downstairs and have a good meal before going out to start a new day! During the National Day, the weather is not so good. You can borrow an umbrella at the hotel entrance. When traveling at low temperatures, the young lady at the bar helps us pick up hot water every day. If you are hungry at night, there are free small wontons. You can order takeout to eat in the restaurant or be delivered upstairs by a robot.

In short, I will consider this hotel again if I need it in the future, I hope it can be maintained~

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

CitiGO is personally written and designed by an internationally renowned designer to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent guest control". The hotel has always been committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content:
優點：①位置好，離地鐵站近；②放了四瓶水，其中有飲料；③服務好；④沒有挨着主幹道，窗戶隔音效果好；⑤機器人送東西很有意思，還可以幫忙把外賣送到房間門口。
缺點：①最大那個枕頭有明顯的異味，根本沒法靠近；②淋浴水壓實在太小；③馬桶很不容易沖乾淨；④房間小，窗戶小；
commentList.translatedContent:
Advantages: ①Good location, close to the subway station; ②Four bottles of water, including drinks; ③Good service; ④Not next to the main road, the windows have good sound insulation effect; Delivered to the door of the room.
Disadvantages: ①The biggest pillow has an obvious peculiar smell, and it is impossible to get close at all; ②The shower water is too small; ③The toilet is not easy to flush; ④The room is small and the window is small;

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗，CitiGO重視每一位客人提出的意見和建議，感謝您的信任和指正。我們一定會不斷反思和改進，為大家創造更好的入住體驗。

commentList.content: 每次來北京都會住這家酒店，地理位置太方便了，周邊吃喝玩樂應有盡有。房間不大，但是床品還算很舒適啦！空氣清新，總之住着很舒服很乾凈，服務人員很熱情[呲牙]尤其是今天打掃酒店814房衛生的阿姨[愛心]
commentList.translatedContent: Every time I come to Beijing, I will stay at this hotel. The location is too convenient, and there are everything to eat, drink and play around. The room is not big, but the bedding is quite comfortable! The air is fresh, in a word, it is very comfortable and clean to live in. The service staff are very enthusiastic [呲 tooth], especially the aunt who cleaned the 814 room of the hotel today [Love]

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO服務的認可！我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content:
酒店很好，交通便利，乘坐地鐵非常方便！
早餐豐富，提供至中午12點，良心！
晚上10點至11點提供夜宵餛飩
房間硬件新穎，智能化程度高，智能機器人服務，小冰吧飲料免費，滿意。
唯一不足的就是房間較小，但如果是一人出行，是不二選擇！！
commentList.translatedContent:
The hotel is very good, the transportation is convenient, and it is very convenient to take the subway!
The breakfast is rich, served until 12 noon, conscience!
Supper wontons available from 10pm to 11pm
The hardware of the room is novel, the degree of intelligence is high, the service of intelligent robots, and the drinks in the ice bar are free, satisfactory.
The only downside is that the room is small, but if you are traveling alone, it is the best choice! !

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is within walking distance of Sanyuanqiao subway. The decoration style is very unique and I like it very much. The hotel is fully intelligent, and I especially like the shower.

In terms of sleep and bathing, CitiGO has always adhered to high quality standards. We will continue to work hard to create more and better staying experiences, and we look forward to your staying again!

commentList.content: 一進酒店，服務員態度比較木，要個小童拖鞋等了兩個多小時催了兩次才送到房間，⚠️房間水壺上麪有漂浮物，燒了4-5壺還是一樣，最終用京東到家買了兩桶農夫山泉⚠️跟服務人員換個水壺等了老半天都不出現，準備下樓投訴才在電梯口偶遇工作人員。手機支架是壞的，衛生差、設備維護跟不上、床單有破洞。
commentList.translatedContent: As soon as I entered the hotel, the attitude of the waiter was rather awkward. I asked for children’s slippers and waited for more than two hours before they were sent to the room twice. ⚠️There were floating objects on the kettle in the room. After 4-5 pots were burned, it was the same. Finally, I bought them with Jingdong Daojia. I had two buckets of Nongfu Springs ⚠️ and the service staff changed a kettle and waited for a long time without showing up. I was about to go downstairs to make a complaint before I ran into the staff at the elevator entrance. The phone holder is broken, the sanitation is poor, the equipment cannot be maintained, and the sheets have holes.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人：       您好！感謝您的入住，很抱歉沒能給您的這次帶來很好地入住體驗，針對您提出的服務的意見門店會積極整改加強對員工的培訓，很抱歉在您需要送物的時候沒能將物品第一時間送到您房間，房間的衛生問題門店針對此次事情，每日加強對房間的衛生細節的打掃與檢查，關於房間的水的問題想在此跟您解釋一下，房間內的瓶裝水是巴馬鉑泉天然礦泉水，水燒開後會有微量的礦物質析出，很遺憾沒能在您有疑問的時候第一時間為您做出解答給您造成誤解，感謝您對門店提出的寶貴意見，我們會不斷反思和改進，為大家創造更好的入住體驗。
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest: Hello! Thank you for your stay. I am sorry that I failed to bring you a good check-in experience this time. The store will actively rectify and strengthen the training of employees in response to your service opinions. I am sorry that I failed to deliver when you needed to deliver Items will be delivered to your room as soon as possible, and the hygiene problem in the room. In response to this incident, the store has strengthened the cleaning and inspection of the hygiene details of the room every day. I would like to explain to you about the water in the room. The bottled water in the room The water is natural mineral water from Bama Platinum Spring. After the water is boiled, there will be a small amount of mineral precipitation. It is a pity that I could not answer you when you have questions and cause misunderstanding. Thank you for your suggestions to the store. For your valuable opinions, we will continue to reflect and improve to create a better check-in experience for you.

commentList.content: 衛生整潔，價格公道，早餐豐富。
commentList.translatedContent: Clean and tidy, reasonable price, rich breakfast.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。在CitiGO，自助早餐7:00-12:00超長待機，再不用在睡懶覺和吃早餐之間煩惱抉擇。每晚22:00-23:00，餐廳提供免費宵夜，溫暖身心。一切衹為讓您享受到更貼心的關懷，真誠期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guests, thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO. At CitiGO, the buffet breakfast is on standby from 7:00-12:00, so you don't have to worry about choosing between sleeping in and eating breakfast. From 22:00 to 23:00 every night, the restaurant provides free late-night snacks to warm the body and mind. Everything is only for you to enjoy more intimate care, and sincerely look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 在citigo住了一共不下十幾晚，甚至因為citigo辦了華住酒店金卡會員，最後這次服務是最窩火的。把AirPods遺留在酒店，打過四次電話確認一開始客房都跟我說沒有任何東西遺留，但因為我百分百確認我是放在了酒店，所以再三要求客房尋找。此外還有一個綠包還有幾個全新未拆的膠水。都是我經過再三問詢酒店才告訴我有。以服務員不知道是幹什麼用的就拿走了的理由搪塞我；請問貴店，在酒店客人遺留的任何物品都應該放到前台等着客人認領吧？至於做何用處，是否有用也不應該是服務員該操心的事情，何況裏面還有全新的東西，被你們拿走研究，客人再三問詢都不主動交出。直到我說我要報警查監控，貴店就找到了貴重耳機及其他東西，是四次電話中百分百確認沒有的東西。如果不是我的再三要求，我的耳機以及其他東西就要被貴店服務員以不知道這東西是幹嘛的所以就拿走了的原因徹底消失了。作為四百多一晚的酒店，最基本的保護客人遺留物品都做不到，反而任由所謂的其他人侵佔；且不說這種行為以及構成了侵占罪甚至盜竊罪，以及讓人覺得住在這家酒店基本的財產安全都得不到保證。
commentList.translatedContent: I stayed at citigo for more than ten nights in total, and even because citigo became a Gold Card member of Huazhu Hotel, the last service was the most annoying. Left the AirPods in the hotel, and made four calls to confirm that the guest room told me that there was nothing left, but because I was 100% sure that I left it in the hotel, I repeatedly asked the guest room to find it. There is also a green bag with several brand new unopened glues. It was only after I repeatedly asked the hotel that they told me there was. Prevaricate me with the excuse that the waiter took it away without knowing what it was for; may I ask your shop, any items left by guests in the hotel should be placed at the front desk for the guests to claim? As for what it is useful for, and whether it is useful or not, it shouldn't be the waiter's heart, not to mention that there are brand new things in it, which are taken away by you for research, and the guests will not take the initiative to hand them over after repeated inquiries. Until I said I wanted to call the police and check the surveillance, your store found valuable earphones and other items, which were 100% confirmed to be missing in the four phone calls. If it wasn't for my repeated requests, my earphones and other things would have disappeared completely because the waiter in your store took them away because they didn't know what they were for. As a hotel with more than 400 nights, it can't do the most basic protection of the guest's leftovers, but allows the so-called others to occupy it; not to mention that this behavior constitutes the crime of embezzlement or even theft, and makes people feel Basic property security is not guaranteed at this hotel.

feedbackList.content: 抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗。您的意見和建議已收到，我們會儘快核實自查，加強對相關工作人員的監督和培訓。任何問題，可隨時聯繫我們的工作人，我們會儘力給您滿意的答覆。
feedbackList.translatedContent: Sorry for your bad stay experience. Your comments and suggestions have been received, we will verify and self-check as soon as possible, and strengthen the supervision and training of relevant staff. Any questions, feel free to contact our staff, we will try our best to give you a satisfactory answer.

commentList.content: 設施方便，很智能，服務好
commentList.translatedContent: Convenient facilities, very smart, good service

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO服務的認可！我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your recognition of CitiGO service! We will continue to work hard to provide more attentive service for each guest, and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content:
🚗 交通：在鳳凰匯邊上，吃飯買東西都非常方便，不遠就是三元橋站A口，地理位置不錯
🧹衛生：阿姨打掃很負責，好像也有換布草，每天兩瓶水一聽可樂一聽蘇打水。總之衛生沒啥問題
🍃環境：房間內布置的挺好的，一樓的公共區域也很不錯
🔔服務：服務態度都很棒
有一些地方體驗很差。配的冰箱其實並不怎麼製冷，幾乎不冰，而且容量很小..網絡體驗奇差無比，首先樓內本身信號就很差，數據五格信號通常在2-3之間波動，偶爾有4。wifi是登錄了才能使用的，有時候不一定能跳出登錄界麪，而且即使連上了也體驗極糟。工程表示他們其實知道網絡評價都很差，他們也反饋了但是沒用。總之網絡體驗還不如最基礎的快捷酒店......補個早餐，種類挺豐富的，味道也不錯。
commentList.translatedContent:
🚗 Transportation: It is very convenient for eating and shopping beside the Phoenix Hui. It is not far from Exit A of Sanyuanqiao Station, which has a good location.
🧹Hygiene: Auntie is very responsible for cleaning. It seems that she also changes the linen. Every day, two bottles of water, one can of Coke and one can of soda. Anyway, there is no problem with hygiene
🍃Environment: The room layout is very good, and the public area on the first floor is also very good
🔔Service: The service attitude is great
There are some places where the experience is poor. The equipped refrigerator is actually not very cooling, almost no ice, and the capacity is very small. The network experience is extremely poor. First of all, the signal inside the building itself is very poor, and the five-cell data signal usually fluctuates between 2-3, occasionally 4 . Wi-Fi can only be used after logging in, sometimes it may not be able to jump out of the login interface, and even if it is connected, the experience is extremely bad. Engineering said that they actually knew that the Internet evaluation was very poor, and they also gave feedback but it was useless. In short, the network experience is not as good as the most basic express hotel...make up a breakfast, the variety is quite rich, and the taste is good.

feedbackList.content: 抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗，CitiGO重視每一位客人提出的意見和建議，感謝您的信任和指正。我們一定會不斷反思和改進，為大家創造更好的入住體驗。
feedbackList.translatedContent: Sorry for the bad staying experience. CitiGO values the comments and suggestions made by every guest. Thank you for your trust and correction. We will continue to reflect and improve to create a better experience for everyone.

commentList.content: 酒店設計很時尚，適合年輕人，大堂前台接待專業，服務很到位； 大堂有桌球，早餐廳區域，及休閑區域； 早餐很貼心的時間設置直到中午12點才結束； 一層還設有健身房及洗衣房；
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel design is very fashionable and suitable for young people. The reception desk in the lobby is professional and the service is in place; the lobby has billiards, breakfast area, and leisure area; breakfast is very intimate time setting until 12 noon; there is also a gym and laundry room;

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content:
早餐豐富多樣，可選性較多。
兩個女孩子定了大床房，較為舒適。
酒店服務優質，智能化很便捷。
距離天安門有點遠，不考慮距離的話還是比較推薦的。
commentList.translatedContent:
The breakfast is rich and varied, with more choices.
The two girls booked a big bed room, which is more comfortable.
The hotel's services are high-quality and intelligent and convenient.
It’s a bit far from Tiananmen Square, so it’s recommended if you don’t consider the distance.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。在CitiGO，自助早餐7:00-12:00超長待機，再不用在睡懶覺和吃早餐之間煩惱抉擇。每晚22:00-23:00，餐廳提供免費宵夜，溫暖身心。一切衹為讓您享受到更貼心的關懷，真誠期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 感覺還行，休息的很好，估計也是太累了
commentList.translatedContent: I feel okay, rested well, I guess I'm too tired

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇入住CitiGO。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……在睡眠和沐浴方面，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing to stay at CitiGO. German showers, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattresses, down bedding... CitiGO has always adhered to high quality standards when it comes to sleeping and bathing. We will continue to work hard to create more and better stay experiences and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 新乾淨近地鉄商場。好飯店
commentList.translatedContent: New and clean Jindi shopping mall. good hotel

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for trusting and liking CitiGO. A person's nine-to-five is not as good as a group of people's joy field. I hope that the rich and powerful shared living room of the hotel will bring you more wonderful experiences and look forward to your every stay!

commentList.content: 地理位置很好，地鐵站出來兩三百米，附近有鳳凰商業體，吃飯方便，也有711便利店。蓮蓬頭、電視機、自動窗帘、牙膏品質都不錯。不過個人始終覺得洗浴用品也是酒店品質重要指標之一，國外同等星級酒店一般都是品牌洗浴用品。這個酒店洗浴一般沒用，希望可以提升洗浴用品質量。
commentList.translatedContent: The geographical position is very good, two to three hundred meters from the subway station, there is the Phoenix Commercial Complex nearby, it is convenient to eat, and there are also 711 convenience stores. The shower head, TV, automatic curtain, and toothpaste are all of good quality. However, I always feel that toiletries are also one of the important indicators of hotel quality. The same star-rated hotels in foreign countries are generally branded. The bath in this hotel is generally useless, I hope to improve the quality of toiletries.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：CitiGO重視每一位客人提出的意見和建議，感謝您的信任和指正。我們一定會不斷反思和改進，為大家創造更好的入住體驗。
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: CitiGO values the comments and suggestions put forward by every guest, thank you for your trust and correction. We will continue to reflect and improve to create a better staying experience for everyone.

commentList.content: 入住了3個晚上，入住了才知道是華住會旗下的酒店品牌。總體來說還是不錯的，前台接待的幾個小哥哥小姐姐都非常熱情，很有耐心。一樓有洗衣房和健身房，洗衣房晚上人很多，需要排隊。健身房不大，器械也不多，也就走走跑步機。房間衛生是可以的，但是就是唯一一點，相信入住的其它點評也描述了，房間很小，比較擁擠。住着有點兒憋屈。那相對於這個價格就有點兒高了，但是酒店的地理位置不錯，出門走路2分鐘地鐵站。要是訂酒店的外賣是小機器人送外賣上樓的。
commentList.translatedContent: After staying for 3 nights, I knew it was a hotel brand under China Lodging Club. Overall it is good. The little brothers and sisters at the front desk were very enthusiastic and patient. There is a laundry room and a gym on the first floor. There are a lot of people in the laundry room at night and there is a queue. The gym is not big and there are not many equipment, so I walked on the treadmill. Room hygiene is ok, but it is the only point, I believe other reviews also describe the stay, the room is small and crowded. Living a little bit aggrieved. That's a bit high for this price, but the hotel is in a good location, 2 minutes walk from the subway station. If you order takeaway from the hotel, the little robot will deliver it upstairs.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：CitiGO邀請國際知名設計師打造共享客廳，酒吧、餐廳、辦公、閱讀、音樂，除了“睡眠和沐浴”，我們鼓勵客人將其他時間交給酒店公區。我們會在您的建議基礎上，繼續努力提升，真誠期待您的諒解。
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guests, hello: CitiGO invites internationally renowned designers to create shared living rooms, bars, restaurants, offices, reading, and music. In addition to "sleep and bath", we encourage guests to give other time to the hotel public area. We will continue to work hard to improve on the basis of your suggestions and sincerely look forward to your understanding.

commentList.content:
酒店距離三元橋很近，步行大約5分鐘。
房間雖然不大，但是布局很合理，感覺很舒適，溫馨，小而緊湊，晚上睡覺時安全感十足。
早餐也不錯，模仿五星酒店的樣子。
唯一的缺點是隔音差點，隔壁開門聲音聽的很清楚，夜晚被關門聲音驚醒
commentList.translatedContent:
The hotel is very close to Sanyuan Bridge, about 5 minutes on foot.
Although the room is not big, the layout is very reasonable, it feels very comfortable, warm, small and compact, and it feels safe to sleep at night.
Breakfast is also good, imitating the look of a five-star hotel.
The only drawback is that the sound insulation is almost sound. The sound of the door opening next door is very clear, and the sound of closing the door at night wakes up

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：CitiGO客房始終嚴守高品質標準德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……請相信我們的真誠和用心致力於為每位客人創造奢華享受。酒店位於東三環三元橋與機場高速及京密路交匯處、三元橋-燕莎商圈核心位置，緊鄰第三使館區，是北京的國門要塞。交通便利，地鐵10號線與機場快軌交匯處，距三元橋地鐵站D口直線距離50米，快速連接北京各大核心商圈。期待再次光臨！

commentList.content: 除了Wi-Fi不行別的都很好，雖然麪積小了點都是五臟俱全，希望Wi-Fi問題儘快改進，很影響體驗
commentList.translatedContent: Except for Wi-Fi, everything else is very good. Although the area is small, it has all the internal organs. I hope that the Wi-Fi problem will be improved as soon as possible, which will affect the experience.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗，CitiGO重視每一位客人提出的意見和建議，感謝您的信任和指正。我們一定會不斷反思和改進，為大家創造更好的入住體驗。

commentList.content: 還是很不錯哦，早餐也很豐盛，衹是都沒去吃，自助洗衣好評。位置就在地鐵口不遠處，離首都機場半小時車程。房間雖小，但卻精緻，床非常舒服，總體感覺不輸遼寧大廈。
commentList.translatedContent: It's still very good, the breakfast is also very good, but I didn't eat it, and the self-service laundry was well received. The location is not far from the subway entrance, a half-hour drive from the Capital Airport. The room is small, but exquisite, the bed is very comfortable, and the overall feeling is not inferior to Liaoning Building.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. CitiGO is personally written and designed by an internationally renowned designer to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent guest control". The hotel has always been committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 真的太喜歡這個酒店啦！早餐好吃！最喜歡淋浴器的按鈕，賊解壓哈哈哈！有阿姨每天都會打掃整理房間。還有超級可愛的機器人送外賣，酒店工作人員態度也很好！下次來北京繼續訂！
commentList.translatedContent: I really like this hotel! The breakfast is delicious! I like the shower button the most, the thief unzip it hahaha! Some aunts clean and tidy the room every day. There are also super cute robots delivering food, and the hotel staff are also very good! Continue to book next time you come to Beijing!

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。在CitiGO，自助早餐7:00-12:00超長待機，再不用在睡懶覺和吃早餐之間煩惱抉擇。每晚22:00-23:00，餐廳提供免費宵夜，溫暖身心。一切衹為讓您享受到更貼心的關懷，真誠期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. In CitiGO, the breakfast buffet is long standby from 7:00-12:00, so you don’t have to worry about choosing between sleeping in and eating breakfast. Every night from 22:00-23:00, the restaurant provides free supper to warm the body and mind. Everything is just for you to enjoy more intimate care, and sincerely look forward to your staying again!

commentList.content: 性價比很高的酒店，房間雖小，五臟俱全。地理位置好，地鐵站就在附近。住着很乾凈，很舒適，早餐感覺比五星酒店還好，已經推薦給來北京玩的朋友們。
commentList.translatedContent: Very cost-effective hotel, the rooms are small and well-equipped. The location is good, the subway station is nearby. The stay was very clean and comfortable. The breakfast felt better than a five-star hotel. I have already recommended it to friends who come to Beijing.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……在睡眠和沐浴方面，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！

commentList.content: 酒店整天環境乾淨衛生，房間空間較小，廁所跟淋浴有點擠，周邊配套非常不錯靠近地鐵站出行房產，有一點就是空調的聲音較大
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is clean and hygienic all day, the room is small, the toilets and showers are a bit crowded, the surrounding facilities are very good, and the property is close to the subway station. One thing is that the sound of the air conditioner is louder

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：：抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗，CitiGO重視每一位客人提出的意見和建議，感謝您的信任和指正。我們一定會不斷反思和改進，為大家創造更好的入住體驗。

commentList.content:
有桌游真的超級加分👍🏻
房間衛生乾淨 服務態度和清潔水平滿分沒得說 細節到位 非常人性化設計大廳乾淨整潔
外賣機器人和家居全部是智能設備 機器人小管家快遞送到門口
早餐7:00-12:00am 菜品豐富口味多樣👍🏻
附近有insstreet裏巷 便利店🏪711 藥店飯店比較齊全 還有一家鳳凰匯 離地鐵站出口走路2分鐘
五星好評👍🏻非常滿意
commentList.translatedContent:
A board game is really super bonus 👍🏻
The rooms are hygienic and clean. The service attitude and cleanliness level are perfect. The details are in place. Very user-friendly design. The hall is clean and tidy.
Take-out robots and home furnishings are all smart devices, and the robot butler is delivered to the door by express delivery
Breakfast 7:00-12:00am The dishes are rich and varied 👍🏻
There is an instreet lane nearby, a convenience store🏪711, pharmacies and restaurants are relatively complete, there is also a Fenghuanghui, which is a 2-minute walk from the exit of the subway station.
Five-star praise 👍🏻Very satisfied

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO. CitiGO is personally written and designed by an internationally renowned designer to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent guest control". The hotel has always been committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 酒店位置太方便了距離三元橋地鐵站就幾分鐘步行，附近就是鳳凰匯吃喝不愁～外賣可以由機器人送到房間，前台邊上有專門收快遞的架子。房間不是很大但對一個人出行的來說還挺好的，倒是樓層無所謂高低因為有一邊的窗戶對出去是寫字樓沒有風景一說。早餐選擇也適中倒是有幾天人是真多都找不到位子。ps有洗衣機和烘乾機對於出行來說真是太太太好了！總體是適合年輕人獨自或情侶出行的酒店啦～
commentList.translatedContent: The location of the hotel is so convenient. It is only a few minutes' walk from Sanyuanqiao Metro Station. Phoenix Hui is nearby to eat and drink~ Takeaways can be delivered to the room by robots. There is a shelf for express delivery beside the front desk. The room is not very big but it is good for a person traveling alone, but the floor level does not matter because there is a window on one side of the office building without a view. The breakfast options are also moderate, but there are so many people who can't find a seat for a few days. ps has a washing machine and dryer, which is great for traveling! Generally, it is a hotel suitable for young people to travel alone or as a couple~

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。在CitiGO，自助早餐7:00-12:00超長待機，再不用在睡懶覺和吃早餐之間煩惱抉擇。每晚22:00-23:00，餐廳提供免費宵夜，溫暖身心。一切衹為讓您享受到更貼心的關懷，真誠期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 早餐不錯，從地鐵站出來很快就到了。有免費洗衣乾衣服務。浴室和廁所乾濕分區，就是房間有點小，把箱子打開就很少位置了。不過牆上有可以打開的地方放箱子和掛衣服
commentList.translatedContent: Breakfast was good and came out of the subway station very quickly. There is free laundry and drying service. The bathroom and toilet dry and wet partition, that is, the room is a bit small, and the box opens very little place. However, there is a place on the wall to open the box and hang clothes.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您入住CitiGO。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……CitiGO客房始終嚴守高品質標準。請相信我們的真誠和用心致力於為每位客人創造奢華享受。CitiGO邀請國際知名設計師打造共享客廳，酒吧、餐廳、辦公、閱讀、音樂，除了“睡眠和沐浴”，我們鼓勵客人將其他時間交給酒店公區。我們會在您的建議基礎上，繼續努力提升，真誠期待您再次光臨。
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for staying at CitiGO. German shower, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattress, down bedding... CitiGO rooms are always strictly up to high quality standards. Please believe that our sincerity and dedication to creating luxury for each guest. CitiGO invited internationally renowned designers to create a shared living room, bar, restaurant, office, reading, music, in addition to "sleep and bathing", we encourage guests to give other time to the hotel public areas. We will continue to work hard to improve on your suggestions and sincerely look forward to your visit again.

commentList.content:
小而精緻、智能。大床，可睡兩人。床靠牆，節約空間。洗手台在房間內，衛生間和淋浴房分離，兩人可分別使用。電動按鈕開窗帘。有多個USB口可給手機充電。有智能機器人送外賣到房間。前台服務員不是職業微笑，是親切的鄰家小妹。離三元橋地鐵口200米，特別近。早餐非常豐盛、美味。每天6瓶免費瓶裝水，方便商務人士。
圖片是設備間（或牆體柱子）裝飾了木條，兼做行李架及衣鈎，設計巧妙。
commentList.translatedContent:
Small and delicate, intelligent. Big bed, can sleep two people. Bed against the wall, save space. The bathroom is in the room, the bathroom and the shower room are separated, two people can use separately. The electric button opens the curtains. There are multiple USB ports to charge the phone. There is a smart robot to send takeaway to the room. The front desk waiter is not a professional smile, is a kind little sister next door. 200 meters from the Sanyuanqiao subway entrance, especially close. The breakfast is very rich and delicious. 6 bottles of free bottled water per day, convenient for business people.
The picture is a wooden bar decorated in the equipment room (or wall column), and is also used for luggage racks and clothes hooks.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……在睡眠和沐浴方面，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！

commentList.content: 非常好的入住體驗，滿滿的科技感，而且有冰箱，設施都齊全，離地鐵站還非常近，如果下次來，我還會推薦大家入住這家酒店。
commentList.translatedContent: Very good experience, full of sense of technology, refrigerator, complete facilities, very close to the subway station, if you come next time, I would recommend everyone to stay in this hotel.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……在睡眠和沐浴方面，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. German showers, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattresses, down bedding... In terms of sleep and bathing, CitiGO has always adhered to high quality standards. We will continue to work hard to create more and better staying experiences, and we look forward to your staying again!

commentList.content: 歡閣酒店就在機場地鐵線三元橋站附近出行方便，早餐特別豐富，蔬菜、肉類、魚應有盡有，點心非常可口。酒店設施齊全比較前衛，要說不足麪積略小，但也是酒店的風格。適合年輕人的酒店，大堂有酒吧、落台等。
commentList.translatedContent: Huange Hotel is conveniently located near Sanyuanqiao Station on the Airport Metro Line. The breakfast is very rich, with vegetables, meat and fish as well as delicious snacks. The hotel facilities are complete and avant-garde. To say that the area is slightly smaller, it is also a hotel style. A hotel suitable for young people, there are bars, set-downs, etc. in the lobby.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。在CitiGO，自助早餐7:00-12:00超長待機，再不用在睡懶覺和吃早餐之間煩惱抉擇。每晚22:00-23:00，餐廳提供免費宵夜，溫暖身心。一切衹為讓您享受到更貼心的關懷，真誠期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. In CitiGO, the breakfast buffet is long standby from 7:00-12:00, so you don’t have to worry about choosing between sleeping in and eating breakfast. Every night from 22:00-23:00, the restaurant provides free supper to warm the body and mind. Everything is just for you to enjoy more intimate care, and sincerely look forward to your staying again!

feedbackList.content: 首都機場進出的有機場地鐵既快又省心省錢，不遠有鳳凰匯可以解決吃飯，購物之需
feedbackList.translatedContent: The airport subway in and out of the Capital Airport is fast, worry-free and money-saving, and there is Phoenix Exchange not far away, which can solve the needs of eating and shopping.

commentList.content: 對於出差而言真的是不錯的選擇，房間雖小但五臟俱全。酒店離地鐵站步行3分鐘左右。早餐品類也很豐富，房間內給準備了飲料夜裡還有小餛飩都是免費的不要太貼心啦。
commentList.translatedContent: It's really a good choice for business trips, the room is small but well-equipped. The hotel is about 3 minutes walk from the subway station. The breakfast category is also very rich. Drinks are prepared in the room and small wontons are free at night. Don't be too considerate.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。在CitiGO，自助早餐7:00-12:00超長待機，再不用在睡懶覺和吃早餐之間煩惱抉擇。每晚22:00-23:00，餐廳提供免費宵夜，溫暖身心。一切衹為讓您享受到更貼心的關懷，真誠期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 位置好 設施好
commentList.translatedContent: Good location and good facilities

CitiGO has always adhered to high quality standards when it comes to sleeping and bathing. We will continue to work hard to create more and better stay experiences and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 整體入住體驗還是不錯的，非常適合年輕人，比較智能，雖然房間非常緊湊，但是對於獨自出行還是足夠了，早餐可以到十二點，也非常人性化，品種也比較豐富。值得再次體驗。
commentList.translatedContent: The overall check-in experience is good. It is very suitable for young people. It is smart. Although the room is very compact, it is enough for traveling alone. Breakfast is available until 12 o'clock. It is also very user-friendly and rich in variety. It is worth experiencing again.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好：感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.translatedContent: Very smart modern hotel comfortable

commentList.content:
特別幫 應有盡有 性價比也很高 走到地鐵站衹需要1-2分鐘 酒店斜對麪就是鳳凰匯商場

除了洗完澡有點冷以外 別的幾乎沒毛病！
commentList.translatedContent:
Special help with everything and great value for money. It only takes 1-2 minutes to walk to the subway station. The hotel is diagonally opposite to the Phoenix Mall

Except that it was a bit cold after the shower, there was almost nothing wrong with it!

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
